name: PoundAd

overview:
PoundAd Classified Ads is a brand new UK based website offering:

  • Cars for sale
  • Property for sale and rent
  • Local businesses
  • Job vacancies
  • Events
  • Charities
  • General items for sale - furniture, clothes, electronics, collectables, etc etc….
  • Testimonials - Rate and review local businesses products and services

Classified ads cost just Â£1 per ad, you can provide contact details, photographs, location details and specific fields relating to your products or services.
